scripts.preinstall: test -d src/ui || (cd src/ && ng new --skip-git --skip-tests=true --routing=false --ssr=false --style=css --standalone ui && cd ui/ && ng add --skip-confirmation @angular/material)
scripts.lint: npm run license && eslint --fix --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern src/ test/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run bundle
scripts.deploy: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && ncp .clasp-dev.json .clasp.json && clasp push -f && source .env && clasp deploy $DEV_DEPLOYMENT_ID
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && ncp .clasp-prod.json .clasp.json && clasp push && source .env && clasp deploy $PROD_DEPLOYMENT_ID
